many-to-one.name: product
many-to-one.formula: (select p.id from product p, orderdetail dt where dt.id=fk_orderdetail_id and p.id = dt.fk_product_id)

property.name: orderNo
property.formula: (select o.order_no from corder o,orderdetail dt where dt.id=fk_orderdetail_id and dt.fk_order_id=o.id )

property.name: customerName
property.formula: (select c.name from customer c, corder o,orderdetail dt where dt.id=fk_orderdetail_id and o.id = dt.fk_order_id and c.id = o.fk_customer_id )

property.name: orderDate
property.formula: (select o.order_date from corder o,orderdetail dt where dt.id=fk_orderdetail_id and o.id = dt.fk_order_id )

property.name: shopName
property.formula: (select s.name from corder o, shop s, orderdetail dt where dt.id=fk_orderdetail_id and o.id = dt.fk_order_id and o.fk_shop_id=s.id)

property.name: model
property.formula: (select p.model from product p,orderdetail d where d.id =fk_orderdetail_id and p.id = d.fk_product_id )
